item.name: Setup
mount XR5 cli R1
check status connected R1

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Not connected yet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

item.name: check uniconfig available R1

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Uniconfig for node not availableyet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Not connected yet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

item.name: check uniconfig available R2

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Uniconfig for node not availableyet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

item.name: configure interface on R1
check interface exists on config R1
configure interface on R2
check interface exists on config R2
check nonexisting interaface on oper R1
check nonexisting interface on oper R2
Tests
one router
replace config with operational on R1
check nonexisting interface on config R1
check interface exists on config R2
check nonexisting interface on oper R1
check nonexisting interface on oper R2
all routers
replace config with operational on R1 and R2
check nonexisting interface on config R1
check nonexisting interface on config R2
check nonexisting interface on oper R1
check nonexisting interface on oper R2
bad input
replace config with operational on R1 and R3

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["output"]["error-message"]).to.eql("Uniconfig nodes [Uri [_value=R3]] do not exist in operational.");

item.name: check interface exists on config R1
check interface exists on config R2
check nonexisting interface on oper R1
check nonexisting interafce on oper R2
Teardown
unmount R1
check unmounted CLI R1
unmount R2
check unmounted CLI R2
